-= Bedroom =-
You arrive in a bedroom. An ordinary one.

You see a closed chest drawer in the room. You can see a closed antique trunk. Hey, want to see a king-size bed? Look over there, a king-size bed. Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. Oh! Why couldn't there just be stuff on it?

There is a closed wooden door leading east.
